segments.advisor_message: Alright, so as we wrap up, can you confirm who the primary owner of this expense will be? Just to clarify, is it you, or perhaps your spouse?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it's mostly me, but sometimes my spouse covers it too, you know, just depends really.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, thanks for that. Now, what would you say is the name of the expense? I mean something like a mortgage payment or groceries?
segments.client_message: Oh, it's mainly, um, groceries but, occasionally, we do take out too. Wait, I mean, just the, uh, grocery expenses right now, not take out!

segments.advisor_message: Good to know! And about how much are you spending on groceries monthly?
segments.client_message: Well, it’s usually around, uh, three hundred maybe, sometimes more if we splurge on stuff or, um, less if we have some coupons and all.
